title: Horse Riding Adventure in the Snowy Mountains
description: Venture to the iconic Snowy Mountains in NSW and embark on the ultimate Australian adventure: horseback riding in the wilderness alongside wild brumbies - as seen on Channel 10 and Channel 7. Stay at the charming Snowy Wilderness, a secluded oasis set amid 3,000 hectares of nature and enjoy a full day of guided horse riding, taking in breathtaking scenery, spotting local wildlife, waterfalls and admiring the rugged wilderness of this enchanting part of NSW.
offer_address: 2911 The Barry Way Jindabyne NSW 2627 Australia

title: NSW Snow Trip: Perisher with Lift Passes
description: Hit the slopes of the largest ski resort in the Southern Hemisphere, located in the Australian Snowy Mountains. Popular for families, groups of friends or couples as a winter trip close to home, you’ll enjoy a two or three-night stay at The Station with two Perisher lift passes per person, 50% off ski and board hire and 30% off ski and snowboard lessons.
offer_address: 8228 The Snowy River Way, Jindabyne NSW 2627

title: NSW Snow Trip: Perisher with Lift Passes Included
description: Hit the slopes of the largest ski resort in the Southern Hemisphere, located in the Australian Snowy Mountains. Popular with families, groups of friends or couples as a winter trip close to home, you’ll enjoy a two or three-night stay at The Station at Perisher Blue Ski Resort with two Perisher lift passes per person, 50% off pre-booked ski and board hire and 30% off ski and snowboard lessons. Packages for two, three or four people available!
offer_address: 8228 The Snowy River Way, Jindabyne NSW 2627

title: Boutique Retreat in the Iconic Snowy Mountains with Full-Day Horse-Ride
description: Embark on a sublime wilderness adventure in one of Australia’s most iconic settings and experience true ‘Man from Snowy River’ country with a day of horseback riding through 7,500 spectacular acres of pristine NSW highlands. Enjoy a stay at the charming Snowy Wilderness, a secluded alpine retreat for two adults in a Country Stone Cottage with a wood fire - with upgrades for up to eight people available - a full-day horseback riding trek alongside wild brumbies  and through impressive landscapes, and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout so you can immerse yourself in Australia’s alpine region up until the very last minute.
offer_address: 2911 The Barry Way Jindabyne NSW 2627 Australia

title: Grand Opening: Alpine Chalet Escape to NSW Snowy Mountains near Perisher & Thredbo
description:
After a day on the slopes or trekking through the crisp, alpine wilderness, sink into a deep cosy armchair by the crackling log fireplace and feel your body relax into après-ski bliss from the brand-new Chalet Alpina Jindabyne. A luxe hideaway designed for living off-the-grid in style, this beautifully renovated and newly opened alpine lodge is located just 10km from the Snowy Mountains, with a handy ski storage area and inviting, communal lounge room to share a glass of wine. Whether you're hitting the slopes with your partner or friends in ski season, or the open tracks with the kids in tow, there's so much to do in Jindabyne and the surrounding areas.

Enjoy canoeing and fishing on the crystal-clear waters of Lake Jindabyne, carve up the pristine snow at either Thredbo or Perisher, explore 18km of scenic mountain bike trails at Lake Crackenback, try Australian schnapps crafted from locally-sourced fruit at Wildbrumby Distillery and climb Australia’s tallest mountain at your own pace on the acclaimed Mount Kosciuszko Summit Walk.

title: Snowy Mountains Alpine Retreat near Perisher Valley with Lift Passes & Ski Hire Discounts
description:
Experience the thrill of one of Australia's largest ski slopes with a cosy winter escape at The Station. Positioned in the heart of the Snowy Mountains, you'll be within easy reach of Perisher. After a day on the slopes, retreat to your room, which is an easy walk to The Station's bar and restaurants for the perfect end to a snowy day.

Featuring a collection of rooms that can accommodate up to six guests, an onsite bar for aprés-ski drinks and three restaurants with hearty cuisine, this accommodation provides a warming retreat for a group of friends or the whole family after fun-filled days in the snow.
offer_address: 8228 The Snowy River Way, Jindabyne, New South Wales 2627
